articles.title: Moranbong Band Visits KPA Large Combined Unit
articles.content:
Moranbong Band Visits KPA Large Combined Unit
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent the Moranbong Band to a unit under KPA Large Combined Unit 630 on Thursday, keeping his promise made while inspecting the unit in March last.
					 Among the officials who paid the congratulatory visit to the unit together with the band were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yang Gon, Hwang Pyong So, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jon Chang Bok and Kim Jang Su.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, conveyed to the unit gifts sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Creators and artistes of the band together with senior officials went round the monument to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the room devoted to the education through revolutionary relics, the room devoted to the history of the unit, the heroes hall and sub-unit of the unit.
					
					 Soldiers of the unit presented reed flute pipe ensemble "Song of devoted protection of the leader sung by soldiers in the enemy rear" and martial art of special skill in welcome of them.
					
					 A performance was given by the band at the soldiers' hall before full house in celebration of the first anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 The service personnel and their families were very much pleased and excited to watch at their post the performance of the band, which has developed under the meticulous guidance of Kim Jong Un into an art troupe of national value enjoying high acclamation of the army and people.
					
					 When well-known female singers and instrumentalists appeared on the stage, the audience enthusiastically welcomed them with great excitement and loud applause. 
					
					 A presenter told the audience that Kim Jong Un sent the band to encourage the service personnel of the combined unit, which he loves more than any others, always thinking of it though very busy making preparations for a final battle with enemies to defend the country and its people at a time when huge aggressor forces are staging maneuvers for a war of aggression even in  the sky, land and seas very near the forefront of the country with their destructive weapons involved, pushing the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 She expressed belief that the service personnel of the unit would creditably perform their mission as first-line human bullets and bombs devotedly protecting the leader and members of a death-defying corps and a scouting party for national reunification, bearing deep in mind the profound trust reposed by the Supreme Commander in them by making sure that the Moranbong Band gave its first frontline performance at the unit.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including light music "Look at Us", female trio "When the Night Wears on in This Land", light music "The Country Will Always Remember You" and "Advance and Advance", light music and song "Our March" and finale "People Have Single Mind".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits Marshal Kim Jong Un has performed by successfully weathering the stern trial of history with his firm faith and will to keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism paved by the great Generalissimos.
					
					 At the end of the performance soldiers mounted the stage and said with great excitement that the respected Supreme Commander's dispatch of the Moranbong Band to their unit was a manifestation of his deep trust in the service personnel of the unit and the greatest privilege granted by him to them. 
					
					 They said full of confidence that when the time comes for a final decisive battle, they would storm into the strongholds of the enemies at a lightning speed and deal successive deadly blows at their headquarters and mercilessly blow up all the disgusting military installations and puppet reactionary ruling institutions.
					
					 The audience repeatedly broke out into shouts of slogans including "Let's defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Un!" 
					
					 The creators and artistes of the band promised them that they would wait for the soldiers after setting up a stage for performance celebrating the victory in the war on the debris of the enemies' strongholds. They left the unit amid the warm send-off of the service personnel and their families.

articles.title: S. Korea Can Never Evade Blame for Putting KIZ at Risk of Closure
articles.content:
S. Korea Can Never Evade Blame for Putting KIZ at Risk of Closure
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Thursday as regards that the south Korean group of traitors are kicking up a confrontation racket over the DPRK's important step concerning the situation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ):
					 As already reported, the DPRK Monday declared an important step of withdrawing all its employees from KIZ and temporarily suspending the operations in the zone and stated that it will examine the issue of whether it will allow the existence of the zone or close it in view of the grave situation prevailing in the zone due to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group's hostile acts and their war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The step is a resolute answer and natural decision of the DPRK against the puppet group seeking to use KIZ, symbolic of reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification, as a theatre of confrontation between compatriots and a hotbed of war against the DPRK.
					
					 So, south Korean minor enterprisers and people of different social standings are deeply concerned about the developments in the days ahead, condemning the puppet group for driving KIZ into a crisis.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities and warmongers, however, are letting loose a spate of invectives to evade the blame for the situation, slandering the DPRK's important step with such remarks as "disappointment" and "regret", far from apologizing for their treacherous acts.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" and conservative politicians and paid trumpeters are fostering an atmosphere of confrontation, crying out for "height of pressure on the south", "chocking technique pursuant to minute scenario" and "card for forcing the south to surrender with white flag".
					
					 Worse still, the chief of the inner room of Chongwadae said that the north "suspended normal operations in KIZ", "it breached international norms and broke promise" and "the south wants the north to stop wrong act and have correct option." It is a shameless act just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The south Korean regime is trying to avoid the blame for the grave situation in KIZ and shift it onto the DPRK. It is a ridiculous act to distort the truth, avoid public criticism and lay the blame at the door of the DPRK.
					
					 As known, KIZ is a crystal of leader Kim Jong Il's love for the nation and people and ardent will for reunification and the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The DPRK readily offered a vast area of militarily important vantage along the Military Demarcation Line to be used as the industrial zone and this helped the south side greatly benefit from it economically.
					
					 When traitor Lee Myung Bak worked hard to destroy KIZ, getting on the nerves of the DPRK after coming to power, the latter showed self-restraint out of compatriotic feelings, taking into consideration the situation of minor enterprises of south Korea.
					
					 It is needless to say that KIZ can no longer exist if even the Park Geun Hye regime stands for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is clear who has driven the situation to an extreme phase being keen on the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and north-targeted nuclear war moves and who has gone reckless to turn KIZ into a hotbed of war by introducing a U.S. special force there.
					
					 It is none other than the puppet group, plot-breeders, who slandered the DPRK's efforts to maintain KIZ with such rhetoric as "financial source".
					
					 The puppet group totally nullified and ditched the north-south agreements, put the inter-Korean relations at state of war and is kicking up the frantic anti-DPRK racket under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch whose legitimacy is recognized by international law. This being a hard fact, the group branded the important step taken by the DPRK for the defence of its dignity and sovereignty as the "violation of the north-south agreement and international norms". This is utterly shocking.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that it is none other than the chief of the inner room of Chongwadae who should stop "wrong acts" and make a "correct option".
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea can never shirk off the responsibility for putting KIZ, which continued its existence even in the period of traitor Lee Myung Bak's rule, at the risk of closure.
					
					 It is an unpardonable treacherous crime to turn KIZ, a precious result of the June 15 joint declaration, into the hotbed of confrontation with compatriots and the source of war.
					
					 If the puppet group continues its bid to make a fun of the DPRK's important step, this will entail irretrievably serious consequences.
					
					 The group should bear in mind the DPRK's warning that this important step is temporary and what will happen in the days ahead entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: CPRK Warns US, S. Korea Not to Make Misjudgment
articles.content:
CPRK Warns US, S. Korea Not to Make Misjudgment
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1029 Thursday.
					 The puppet group of south Korea, taken aback by the toughest steps taken by the DPRK to defend its dignity and sovereignty, is letting loose absurd remarks, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 Those concerned of the puppet regime including Chongwadae, experts and conservative media have remarked that the north will not provoke an all-out war even though it ratchets up threats. They are describing those steps as "brinkmanship tactics", saying that study into the inside of the north shows that the people are leading a peaceful life as usual.
					
					 They are also calling those steps an "extreme psychological warfare" and "sort of propaganda".
					
					 Our comment to their rhetoric about "psychological warfare" and "propaganda" is that they are free to think at their will but should not belatedly regret having done such a thing.
					
					 Now south Koreans buy out food and daily necessities out of extreme war-phobia, making volumes of sale soar.
					
					 Several countries are taking measures to provide shelter or evacuate their people residing in south Korea, and foreign students, businessmen and institutions are thrown into chaos, trying to find their way out of south Korea.
					
					 The puppet group of south Korea is resorting to smear propaganda campaign to seek its comfort by forcing others into death like itself.
					
					 The arrows indicating the merciless retaliatory strikes have already been drawn directing at the U.S. mainland, U.S. military bases in the Pacific and all other bases where the U.S. imperialist aggression forces station.
					
					 The powerful strike means of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have been put in their places and the coordinates of targets put into the warheads.
					
					 Just pressing the button will be enough to turn the strongholds of the enemies into the sea of fire.
					
					 However, the south Korean regime is talking about "psychological warfare" and "propaganda campaign". This is a despicable act which can be done only by imbeciles and fools unaware of what an all-out action declared by the DPRK is like and what consequences their acts will entail.
					
					 As for their talk about peaceful activities in the north, it is the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to carry on production and construction till midnight today and have children taught at schools even though a war might break out tomorrow.
					
					 The DPRK has won victories in confrontation with the U.S. in this spirit and is waging an all-out action with it, with confidence in final victory.
					
					 The enemies should know that it is the era of the great Marshal Kim Jong Un, leader of the most powerful country and invincible great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean war maniacs are gravely mistaken and misjudged if they think they can have lucky chance.
					
					 War can break out any moment and what remains to be done is merciless punishment of the enemies.
					
					 Belated regret will be useless and not a single man will be able to survive to regret for his doing.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Un's Election as First Secretary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Un's Election as First Secretary
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here Thursday to celebrate the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the state.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the army, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and the arts, public health and media, labor innovators and other people.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee who doubles as president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK by unanimous desire and will of all party members, service personnel and other people was a political event and a national auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Referring to the undying exploits Kim Jong Un performed for the party, revolution, country and nation by leading the drive for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche on the watershed of history when a new century of Juche began, the reporter continued:
					
					 He made sure that the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was spruced up as the supreme temple of Juche and eternal sacred temple of the sun, and statues and portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were displayed in different parts of the country.
					
					 Thanks to his noble intention and wise leadership the Law on the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was adopted and the Socialist Constitution was amended and supplemented at the 7th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, legalizing the palace as a grand monument to the immortality of the leader and symbol of the dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 He formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the revolutionary idea of the WPK and set it as the supreme programme of the party to model whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, thereby providing an eternal banner of victory of the Juche revolution.
					
					 He advanced the idea of building the People's Army into a reliable scout force and mainstay of the Songun revolution firmly guaranteeing the party's cause with arms and successfully embodied it to make an epochal turn in bolstering military capability.
					
					 The successful third underground nuclear test which startled the world was a historic event that consolidated the high prestige of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state and fully demonstrated its tremendous military muscle.
					
					 He laid out new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force under the prevailing situation and according to the lawful requirement of the developing Korean revolution, providing a powerful weapon for protecting the independent dignity of Songun Korea forever and achieving the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 At a time when the enemies tightened illegal "sanctions" on the DPRK and openly launched military offensive against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and third underground nuclear test for self-defence, he inspected island detachments in the biggest hotspots one after another, finally examined and ratified the firepower strike plan of the Strategic Rocket Force, striking terror into the hearts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and demonstrating the invincible stamina of heroic Korea.
					
					 The dynamic advance for building a thriving nation is firmly guaranteed politically and militarily and new structure of strength has taken a shape in Northeast Asia with the DPRK in the center. This is a shining fruition of his outstanding stratagem and invincible Songun leadership.
					
					 He made sure that Kim Jong Il's patriotism swept across the country, and the economy was kept afloat through the implementation of the party's economic policy, Korean-style economic strategy. He also saw to it that all fields and units have made progress in an innovative and robust way by learning from the substantial traits of creation displayed by the Moranbong Band.
					
					 The successful launch of the first application satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 displayed the dignity and honor of the sun's nation and showed the world the stand of the DPRK that it does whatever it is determined to do.
					
					 His steadfast line on national independence and Songun revolutionary leadership guaranteed the steady progress of the struggle for national reunification, enhancement of the international position of the DPRK and increased support and solidarity for its revolutionary cause.
					
					  In the course of advancing the revolution and construction by holding Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party, state and the army, the army and people of the DPRK realized his personality as a great man possessed of qualifications as modern statesman. The world progressives are praising him as the world's most famous man and expressing respect and trust in him.
					
					 The reporter called for glorifying the glorious Kim Jong Un's era with final victory in building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Foreigners Here

Foreigners Here
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Foreigners arrived here Thursday to take part in celebrations of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They include a delegation of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works led by Chairman Vadim Kudimin, a Mongolian delegation of Juche idea study organizations led by N. Bold, chairman of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, a French delegation for the study of the Juche idea led by Alain Desjacques, the chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and Elena Bavichi, chairperson of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia.

					 And some Chinese guests arrived here to take part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Uruguayan Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message from Uruguayan Party Leader
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Ruben Maria Vera, chairperson of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, on April 5.
					 In the message the chairperson expressed full solidarity and support for the cause of Kim Jong Un to defend socialism and the achievements made by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, on behalf of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their stooges are making desperate efforts to destroy by employing every possible means all the political, social and material achievements made by the Korean people under the correct guidance of the party and the leader, as they did against other peoples of the world, the message said.
					
					 The dignity and strength of Kim Jong Un and his party and people are a paragon of mankind, the message stressed.
					
					 It extended fraternal greetings to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, April 15, and wished him greater success in his work of leading the people in their struggle to win the victory of socialism and defeat the imperialists and their stooge allies.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese Zhang Weihua's Family
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese Zhang Weihua's Family
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Thursday on the occasion of the first anniversary of his election as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Body
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Body
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange on the occasion of the first anniversaries of his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					 Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the society who is leading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK, handed over the floral basket to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Tribute to Statues
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Tribute to Statues 
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Members of the delegation of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange headed by Chairman Kenki Nakamura and other foreigners visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 The guests paid tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, looking up to their statues.
					
					 They entered the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state before making bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display, the mourning hall and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) led by Ri Ki Sok, advisor of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues, recollecting the noble revolutionary life of the peerlessly great men who devoted their whole life to strengthening Chongryon and reunifying the country, and made bows.
					
					 The delegation arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Artistes Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
articles.content:
Artistes Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Third April Spring People's Art Festival placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Pay Floral Tribute to Statues
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Economic and commercial councilors of foreign embassies here laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday and made a bow to them.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Economic and commercial councilors of foreign embassies here visited Mangyongdae on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In Mangyongdae the President was born, spent his childhood and cultivated the great aim of the revolution. The visitors looked round historic relics preserved in the old home, being briefed on stories about the historic home.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Wang Zhilin, economic and commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy, said:
					
					 In every April many people visit Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President.
					
					 Whenever we visit Mangyongdae, we get wrapped in solemn feelings.
					
					 The Korean people are full of determination to eternally glorify the great feats made by the President.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Historic Site
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Historic Site
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here Thursday visited the Historic Site Associated with the Fatherland Liberation War with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Being briefed on the fact that during the last Fatherland Liberation War the President put forward the unique military idea and strategic and tactical policies there and wisely led the whole party, army and all the people to victory, the guests went round the commanding post of the Supreme Command, the operation room, etc. 
					
					 They also visited different historic relics associated with activities of leader Kim Jong Il who learnt the Juche-oriented military tactics and commanding art of the President and cherished noble patriotism and love for people while staying there during the war.

articles.title: Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) visited Mangyongdae on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, the President's grandparents, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, before paying silent tribute to them. 
					
					 They looked round historic relics preserved in the old home of the President, looking back on his immortal revolutionary life.
					
					 The chief said:
					
					 This visit deepened my longings for the President.
					
					 The great President devoted everything to the sacred cause of the country and the nation. He is the eternal sun of our nation.
					
					 He led those people who aspired after the country's reunification with his broad magnanimity and generosity.
					
					 The feats performed by him for the great national unity and the country's reunification will be everlasting.
					
					 The AINDF vanguard fighters will more dynamically wage the movement for independent reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Military Attaches Visit Pyongyang Folklore Park
articles.content:
Military Attaches Visit Pyongyang Folklore Park
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Pyongyang Folklore Park on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the park was magnificently built in the vast area at the foot of Mt. Taesong, comprehensively showing the history of the Korean nation and its culture, they toured areas for general history education, display of historical relics, folklore village, etc.
					
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, Iranian military attache who is a doyen of the corps, made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 He wrote that it would have been unthinkable without patriotism of leader Kim Jong Il that the Pyongyang Folklore Park was built as the center for cultural education, serving as a reminder of the time-honored history of Korea.
					
					 Paying deep attention to the building of the park and visiting it more than once, the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un guided its construction, he wrote.
					
					 He wished the army and people of the DPRK success in their effort for building a thriving nation and in the struggle against imperialism under Kim Jong Un's leadership.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held in Different Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held in Different Parts of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Huge crowd of young people and students in the DPRK Thursday gathered in different parts of the country to hold dancing parties to mark the first anniversaries of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Young people packed the venues for the events. They were very proud of vigorously advancing to the road of independence, Songun and socialism holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the WPK and the state.
					
					 Those venues include the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, Arch of Triumph and Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 They began to dance amid the playing of the song "Our Leader Loved by the People", extending the highest glory and congratulations to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They danced to the tunes of such songs as "Glory to Our Great Party", "Our Satellite Is on Its Orbit" and "Push back Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology".
					
					 The high zeal of the young people to give full play to the spirit of the young people in the era of Songun in the struggle for implementing the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force boosted the elated atmosphere.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in all provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: 3rd April Spring People's Art Festival Opens
articles.content:
3rd April Spring People's Art Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Third April Spring People's Art Festival was opened with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Thursday.
					 The festival brought together nearly 70 art troupes selected in the contests of province, city and county, thousands of artistes and other people and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 The festival will be divided into the professional art, national art squads and national itinerant art squads and national working people's art festivals.
					
					 In the outdoor venue of the opening ceremony on the bank of the River Taedong garbed in festive attire, festival posters were set up and festival flags were fluttering.
					
					 To the tune of light music, dance with fans and dance turning round were shown, stirring up an atmosphere of the ceremony.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, participants in the festival, creators and artistes.
					
					 Hong Kwang Sun, minister of Culture who is also chairman of the festival organizing committee, said in an opening address that the festival is the great political art festival for singing songs lauding the sun, reflecting the ardent yearning for President Kim Il Sung and the iron will of all the army and the people to hold in high esteem the Generalissimos as the eternal symbols of the great Paektusan nation and the banner of all victories and glories.
					
					 The songs full of the will of the DPRK army and the people to significantly greet the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and to achieve a final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation true to the line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and building of nuclear force under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un will be sung at the festival, he noted.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 An opening performance was given.

articles.title: 18th Culinary Festival Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
18th Culinary Festival Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 18th Culinary Festival marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) took place at Pyongyang Noodle House from Tuesday to Thursday. 
					 More than 60 units selected from the General Bureau for Service for People, ministries, national institutions and all provinces took part in the festival.
					
					 The participants presented folk foods and dishes developed to suit to their units' characteristics and many scientific and technological achievements.
					
					 Appreciated at the festival were sturgeon and terrapin dishes, sinsollo (dish in cooking brazier), quail dish and other foods presented by Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, Yanggakdo International Hotel and Pyongyang Koryo Hotel.
					
					 Highly appreciated were various colorful foods presented by the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau, combined restaurants in Phyongchon, Moranbong and Sosong Districts, and Kangwon and South Hwanghae provinces and Rason City.
					
					 Its closing ceremony took place on Thursday.
					
					 The festival marked a good occasion to find out traditional folk foods and local special dishes, increase the culinarians' art and improve the people's food culture as required by the developing reality.

articles.title: Culinary Festival in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Culinary Festival in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 18th Culinary Festival Marking the Day of the Sun (April 15), President Kim Il Sung's birthday, began here on Tuesday. 
					 In this regard, KCNA had interviews with Deputy Secretary Kang Ki Jong and an official Jong Won Myong of the Korean Association of Cooks.
					
					 Q: Can you tell me about the scale and proceedings of the festival. 
					
					 A (Kang): The festival drew 50 odd entities under the Korean Association of Cooks. 
					
					 It consists of a cooking skill contest and demonstration, a display of local special dishes, noted dishes served at restaurants and fixed dishes, a show of cooking techniques and a short course. 
					
					 Q: Please tell me about the attractions of the festival.
					
					 A (Jong): They include dishes made of terrapin, sturgeon and quail and goose steamed with fruit spices, presented by the Okryu Restaurant.
					
					 Varieties of eel dishes presented by the Ryugyong Rungna Restaurant also catch the visitors' eyes.
					
					 Noticeable are the seafood stew and slices of mixed raw fish, presented by South Hamgyong Province and Nampho City.
					
					 The bouilli chicken with insam inside, one of special diets of Kaesong City, is one of the attractions.
					
					 The festival will be conducive to popularizing excellent cookery and upgrading the food culture.

articles.title: Second Round of Premier Soccer League under Way
articles.content:
Second Round of Premier Soccer League under Way
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The second round of the premier soccer league is under way at Kim Il Sung Stadium and the Sosan Football Stadium here as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games.
					 The league matches, which began on April 6, are attended by 14 male and 13 female teams, divided into two groups respectively in men's and women's events.
					
					 The top two teams from each group will compete in semi-finals and finals.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Bag Gold, Silver Medals
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Bag Gold, Silver Medals
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK athletes bagged medals at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					 Kwon Yong Gwang took the title of men's 62kg events on April 10.
					
					 He lifted 116 kg in snatch and 142 kg in jerk, winning three gold medals.
					
					 Rim Un Sim finished second in women's 53kg snatch and jerk events, bagging three silver medals.

articles.title: Mangyongdae, Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
articles.content:
Mangyongdae, Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of visitors is now flowing to Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, with the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), his birthday.
					 In Mangyongdae there is a modest straw-thatched house where the President was born.
					
					 Recollecting the President's reminiscences "With the Century" on his family history, the visitors to the house look at the historic relics like handmill, misshapen jar and farm implements which the Mangyongdae family had used.
					
					 After visiting Mangyongdae, Neil Fitzgerald, national chairman of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, said: It is hard to believe that President Kim Il Sung was born in that poor family. Through the visit I have come to know that as he grew up, experiencing sufferings of the nation, he could know well of the people and devote his all for their wellbeing. This old home is a reminder of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The old home in Mangyongdae has been visited by more than 100 million people, including foreigners, over the past 60 odd years.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and White Horse
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and White Horse
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Displayed at the Korean Revolution Museum here is a picture of President Kim Il Sung on a white horse in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					  The white horse, well-known as faithful horse, carried the President on its back to battlefields and through primeval forests for nearly two years. There were many stories about the horse's cleverness during the days.
					
					 In the battle to defend Xiaowangqing, called Machun battle in the history, the overcoat of the President commanding the battle caught fire. The flames could have enveloped him in an instant, but he did not notice it. 
					
					 It was only when the horse began to run with the wind that he discovered the flames on his coat. He had no time to pull it off. At this critical moment, the horse slowed down in front of a snow-covered depression and then slid into it sideways, with its forelegs folded in. The President stumbled into the snow, and the fire on his coat was put out as he rolled over in it. 
					
					 Other stories say that the white horse's foreleg tapped on the fallen tree and the sound woke the President up and that he was surprised to see tears trickling from the horse's eyes as it should have a premonition of parting to be used as draught horse for the people in the guerrilla zone. 
					
					 The President in his reminiscences "With the Century" said: "There is an expression saying 'a faithful dog and a pet horse', but I would rather change the word order and say 'faithful horse and a pet dog.'"

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Represents Dignity, Might of DPRK: Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Represents Dignity, Might of DPRK: Papers
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday editorially mark the first anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 His election to the important posts was a great political event, an auspicious occasion for the nation. It provided a milestone of epochal turn in the development of the party and building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 His august name and image represent the dignity and might of the DPRK and his idea and leadership serve as the ever-victorious banner of the party and the country, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 For the past one year he performed great feats which ordinary politicians would take several years or decades to achieve.
					
					 He provided a firm guarantee for realizing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leaders, demonstrated to the world the independent dignity and invincible spirit of the great Paektusan nation with his energetic Songun leadership and provided the flower garden in which great loving care is shown for the people by putting them above all with his energetic efforts and affection.
					
					 During the last one year, the world respected him who aroused the people stricken with grief over the great loss to the nation and has led the party and the state to great victory. Even hostile forces admired his personality as a great man and spoke highly of him.
					
					 He is in the center of the world political stage.
					
					 Minju Joson says that he is a peerlessly great man who perfectly personifies all the qualities and dispositions to be possessed by a leader.

articles.title: War of Justice Is Way for Durable Peace on Korean Peninsula: Newspaper
articles.content:
War of Justice Is Way for Durable Peace on Korean Peninsula: Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The sacred war of justice for putting an end to political and military provocation by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers and achieving national reunification is the only way for achieving durable peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The frantic joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to invade the DPRK are pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase of a war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Nevertheless, they are shifting the blame for the situation onto the DPRK, persistently spreading the fictitious story of "provocation." As one's true self is bound to come out, they can never impute the responsibility for the acute situation on the peninsula to others.
					
					 The above-said joint military exercises are a product of the U.S. policy of aggression on the DPRK and of the south Korean puppet forces' ambition to invade it, pursuant to the U.S. policy. This is the final phase of the dangerous war racket which has been systematically escalated with the seed of a nuclear war.
					
					 Their war racket is an extremely reckless act of bringing dangerous nuclear holocaust to the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia and the world.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and reunification of the country. However, there is a limit to the patience of the DPRK.
					
					 Its final conclusion is that fire and strength should be countered in kind.

articles.title: US Ambition for Stifling DPRK by Force of Arms Blasted
articles.content:
US Ambition for Stifling DPRK by Force of Arms Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. introduced B-52, B-2A and Cheyenne into south Korea under the pretext of taking part in the joint military exercises and then deployed F-22s in the air force base in Osan. It also decided to deploy Stennis operating in the Indian Ocean and two Nimitz which were anchored at the naval base in its mainland in the operational theatre on the Korean Peninsula before sending them to the Pacific.
					 It also deployed two Aegis destroyers in the West Pacific assigned with duty of operation.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has been reduced to the biggest nuclear hotspot in the world in which all kinds of the U.S. nuclear strike means are amassed, making the outbreak of a nuclear war on this land unavoidable.
					
					 The U.S. is scheming to test the will of the DPRK's counteractions by counting on its numerical and technological advantages. It is also seeking to seduce the DPRK into changing its stand through the demonstration of massive nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK won a victory in the battles against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces in the Korean War in the 1950s. It was not ascribable to the DPRK's numerical and technological advantages.
					
					 Under the outstanding leadership of President Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, the DPRK employed the Juche-based war methods and won the great victory, humbling the U.S. which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 The DPRK now out in the final do-or-die battle with the U.S. is reliably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country with its own strike mode and means. It has the weapon of single-minded unity which no one else has.
					
					 No force on earth can block the just cause of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Papers of S. Korea for Slandering DPRK's Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Papers of S. Korea for Slandering DPRK's Line
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The paid newspapers of south Korea including Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo, Munhwa Ilbo and Segye Ilbo recently released invectives against the DPRK, branding its new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as a "provocation with an attempt at nuclear weaponization" and "the height of brinkmanship tactics". They said that "the north's behavior is becoming increasingly dangerous." They even hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, distorting the truth of the present situation on the Korean Peninsula and spreading misinformation. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The sinister and sordid aim of the south Korean regime and its dutiful quasi-media is to tarnish the image of the DPRK and evade the responsibility for the escalating tension on the peninsula. 
					
					 The present situation proves that those conservative hack papers have always followed the south Korean puppet regime's anti-DPRK plots and now turned into the waiting maid of power bereft of the elementary sense of assessing the situation and discretion. 
					
					 With the north-south confrontation now at the point of explosion the reckless remarks made by quasi-journalists of south Korea have put the fate of the south Korean people at peril.
					
					 They are hideous war criminals to be hanged as they agitate confrontation and war and foster injustice.
					
					 The vicious conservative venal writers had better remember that the coordinates of the dens of the hack papers as well as the strongholds of evils including Chongwadae and the White House have already been entered into precision nuclear strike means of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Plotting to Stamp Out Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Plotting to Stamp Out Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- It has recently been disclosed that unidentified men called international hackers group intruded into internet homepages of the DPRK, posted on them articles malignantly slandering the DPRK's dignity and stole and made public the list of subscribers. What is ill-boding is that the south Korean puppet regime have been engaged in another round of the racket for "eliminating forces following the north", vociferating about the list of subscribers to homepages that has been illegally opened to public.
					 Papers Thursday say in bylined commentaries that this is an intentional and premeditated farce to divert public opinion, distract the attention of south Koreans and get rid of poor plight being driven into a tight corner in the face of the DPRK's toughest offensive. For this the south Korean puppets are highlighting the "gravity of the security crisis caused by those following the north".
					
					 The puppet regime needed a shocking case to tide over the unprecedented crisis and, to this end, inveigled even international hackers group into the smear campaign against the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 This fascist racket, a modern "hunting of witches" aimed to stamp out progressives in south Korea and incite an atmosphere of confrontation with fellow countrymen in its whole society, is a revelation of the criminal moves to revive the era of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The puppet regime's racket for clamping down on progressives will only reveal its fascist nature against the nation and peace. The conservatives' racket for "eliminating those following the north" will awaken the south Koreans of all social standings and spark off massive resistance against the fascist dictatorship.
					
					 With nothing can the hostile forces block the DPRK advancing along the road of justice and patriotism.
					
					 Minju Joson says: Intolerable is the act of the south Korean authorities of introducing even international hackers group into the smear campaign against the DPRK and conducting a modern hunting of witches under the pretext of "eliminating those following the north". Tricksters will have to pay a very high price for their acts.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday dedicates a bylined article to the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Cinematic Art".
					 The work, published on April 11, Juche 62 (1973), deals with the basic issues arising in creating films and literary and art works and the issues in creating Korean-style arts and providing guidance to them.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The issues and ways for the creation of arts and guidance over them clarified in the work mean Kim Jong Il's viewpoint on the revolution and construction and his mode of revolutionary activities as well.
					
					 It is his world of great creation to steadily create new things through the revolutionary practical activities, and show the validity and vitality of the original idea and theory in the great reality before studying and developing any theory.
					
					 He brought about a drastic turn in the literature and the arts first by putting to forms of literature and the arts the great masterpieces created by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the days when creators and artistes were fulfilling their honorable and worthwhile duties of putting the President's works on screen and to plays and novels, they nurtured the absolute trust in the President which will remain unchanged even in any adversity.
					
					 In this period the work style of speed campaign was also created, and the practices of socialist construction peculiar to the DPRK provided.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, supreme incarnation of infinite loyalty to Kim Il Sung, films, novels, dramas and fine art pieces as well as songs praising the leader were created. This made it possible for the Juche literature and arts to defend and glorify century after century their revolutionary character based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Il created an excellent example in embodying the theory of seed not only in creating literary and art works but in building a thriving nation.
					
					 His dedicated services and devotion by which he found and nurtured the seeds for propelling the building of a thriving nation and guaranteeing its victory have brought about great changes on this land under socialism.
					
					 The spirit of speed campaign that was born during the days when he brought a drastic turn in creating literary and art works is being followed up with the offensive spirit of at a go in all the sites of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: KCNA Warns Conservative S. Korean Media against Hackwork
articles.content:
KCNA Warns Conservative S. Korean Media against Hackwork
including Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo, Munhwa Ilbo and Segye Ilbo these days let loose invectives slandering the DPRK's new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. They branded the new line as an "attempt at nuclear weaponization going beyond the level of verbal provocation" and "extreme brinkmanship tactics" in a bid to downplay the value of the line. 
					 This is a traitorous act at the beck and call of the south Korean puppet regime to deny the justice of the new line and its significance in the history of the nation and tarnish the international prestige of the DPRK. 
					
					 The line is a just option to firmly protect the independent dignity of the nation. 
					
					 Existence and development of the Korean nation are now seriously threatened by the U.S. policy to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers conduct joint military drills on an annual basis by activating hundreds of thousands of troops and latest offensive means. However, those drills have not been led to the actual war thanks to the strong war deterrence of the DPRK capable of decisively shattering any military provocation of the aggression forces. 
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are not a political bargaining chip but a reliable war deterrence to thwart aggression by outside forces and a guarantee for protecting the country's sovereignty.
					
					 They constitute the life of the nation that can not be bartered for anything and a national treasure of reunified Korea.
					
					 The new line of the DPRK has a particular significance as it helps the country with the nuclear weapons of independence turn a misfortune into a blessing in the do-or-die battle with the U.S., win victory after victory and lay a foundation for eternal prosperity of the nation in the future.

					 That is why the south Korean puppet group has made desperate efforts with base and dastardly schemes to prevent war-weariness from rapidly spreading to all fabrics of south Korean society after their military inferiority became clear. 					 The hack-writers of south Korea who traded conscience for money have turned into a group of flunkeys, traitors and waiting maids serving the power to commit acts of hideous treachery again. 
					
					 Their reckless words will only put the fate of the south Korean people in peril. 
					
					 The hack-writers are top-class war criminals as they fan up confrontation and war while fostering injustice. 
					
					 The DPRK has already declared that Chongwadae and dens of hack-writers subservient to the south Korean puppet regime are in the range of the strike of the DPRK's final offensive battle for national reunification. 
					
					 Those war criminals who gave up mission and duty of media as mouthpiece of justice and truth and guide of genuine public opinion and their backstage manipulators will never be able to dodge retaliatory strike in the all-out action.

articles.title: S. Korea-US Military Drill, Nuclear War Game
articles.content:
S. Korea-US Military Drill, Nuclear War Game
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. military drill, now under way in south Korea, is a revelation of the U.S. policy for aggression on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the south Korean puppets' deep-rooted ambition for northward invasion.
					 The U.S. and south Korean war hawks have persistently resorted to war provocation moves against the DPRK since the ceasefire (1953) in Korea.
					
					 Over the past 60 years they have ceaselessly staged in south Korea exercises for preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, with U.S. nuclear-powered carriers and latest nuclear war equipment involved. 
					
					 The ongoing joint drill envisages precision attack at strategic bases, dismantlement of nukes and landing and surprise attack operation.
					
					 They dared work out a scenario to hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 Some days ago, they made a "plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war" and launched trainings in coincidence with the plan.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that all military exercises, conducted by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers under the signboard of "defence" and "annual event", are only for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Ji Ho Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 It is the U.S. and its followers that have driven the situation of the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch.
					
					 There is a limit to our patience. Durable peace can be achieved only through a sacred war.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean war maniacs finally ignite an anti-DPRK war, we will smash provokers with merciless nuclear strike.

articles.title: Korean in China Call for Patriotic War for Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in China Call for Patriotic War for Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement "DPRK led by brilliant Songun commander of Mt. Paektu will win victory after victory in the standoff with U.S." on April 6. 
					 Even at this moment the U.S. is running amuck to ignite a war by mobilizing preemptive nuclear attack means despite the repeated warnings issued inside and outside Korea, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The south Korean traitors sycophantic toward the U.S. cried out for "preemptive attack," "strong punishment" and "strike at commanding force" at the instigation of the U.S. Not content with this, they are getting evermore frantic in the moves for aggression after working out the wicked design to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We should sweep away from the earth all the monstrous enemies who make desperate efforts to realize their ambition for aggression while slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 Every Korean with the blood and soul of the Korean nation should actively turn out in the just struggle against the U.S. and south Korean warmongers who try to inflict disasters upon the Koreans. 
					
					 All the Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland all out in the decisive battle with firm faith in a final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to shatter the moves of the U.S. and south Korean group of traitors who are bringing a dark cloud of a nuclear war to hang over Korea and dynamically wage the patriotic war to bring earlier a bright morning of the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Korean Nationals in Russia Hail WPK's New Line
articles.content:
Korean Nationals in Russia Hail WPK's New Line
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia on April 9 issued a statement in support of the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 In the past the Korean nation was fated to be subject to the colonial slavery for decades with its country lost to the Japanese imperialists for it was weak.
					
					 Today the U.S. imperialists and other forces hostile to the DPRK are running amuck to disarm it and topple people-centered socialism.
					
					 They cooked up "resolutions on sanctions" and are staging a nuclear war drill with huge armed forces involved.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves that only when a country has access to nukes can it safeguard itself and guarantee the happiness and prosperity of its people.
					
					 The declaration of legalizing the possession of nukes and expanding and bolstering the nuclear force both in quality and quantity until the world becomes denuclearized was another great victory. It fully demonstrated the dignity and might of the country, dealt a strong blow at the U.S. and other hostile forces and helped accelerate the building of a thriving nation and national reunification.
					
					 The statement expressed the will of all the Korean nationals in Russia to invigorate the patriotic struggle for Korean reunification full of confidence in victory under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who ushered in the new era of eternal prosperity for the people.

articles.title: US Can Never Break DPRK's Will: Korean in US
articles.content:
US Can Never Break DPRK's Will: Korean in US
Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The chairperson of the National Culture and Arts Branch of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued an article speaking highly of the DPRK, which has demonstrated the nation's dignity in protest against the U.S. and its allies' high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S., which has styled itself "the strongest" in the world, is being dragged on by the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is working desperately to bring the north to its knees. 
					
					 In March, the U.S. staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills as part of military operation to contain the north.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the U.S. activated nuclear strategic bomber B-52 to make sorties to the sky above south Korea, creating a dangerous situation on the verge of a war.
					
					 South Korean broadcasts blustered that B-52 brought a decisive victory to the U.S. in the Iraqi war, getting on the nerves of the north.
					
					 No one believes that the bomber can bring achievements to the U.S. in the decisive battle with the north.
					
					 The reason is because the DPRK is not Iraq.
					
					 The U.S. could achieve war results in those countries which were not prepared in terms of military capabilities in the past because they were so weak as not to match the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is now mulling realizing the dream of invasion by flying nuclear strategic bombers in the sky over the Korean Peninsula. But it can not break the will of the army and the people of the DPRK that have achieved the single-minded unity more powerful than nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Art Festival Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Art Festival Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The 20th Art Festival of Korean Nation was held by Koreans in Uzbekistan on April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were officials of organizations of Koreans in Uzbekistan and Koreans there and members of at least 20 Koreans art groups.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Tashkent.
					
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, in his speech said that the life of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is enshrined in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive mankind as it was a shining life for the country and its people.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the homeland as his revolutionary cause had successfully been carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and is being invariably accomplished by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the chairman noted.
					
					 The homeland is placed on high alert on the eve of a war but overseas Koreans are significantly greeting the Day of the Sun, dancing and singing full of conviction of victory as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, outstanding strategist, he stated.
					
					 He called upon overseas Koreans to more dynamically advance for the reunification of the country desired by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Then followed an art festival.
					
					  Put on the stage were choruses "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas", immortal classic masterpiece solo "Azalea", chorus "Korea Is One", solo "Mother" and other numbers. The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Brazil
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Bring the Advantages of Socialism in Our Country into Full Play" was brought out in pamphlet by a Brazilian publishing house on Apr. 5.
					 The work, published on May 24, Juche 79 (1990) comprehensively clarifies the essence and main characteristics of Korean-style socialism which embodies the Juche idea, and its invincibility and advantages.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for giving fullest play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism, implementing the five-point policy for national reunification and consistently carrying out the DPRK's foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship under the uplifted banner of socialism.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Introduces Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Introduces Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association on its special bulletin on April 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Britain
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was published in booklet by the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain on Apr. 6.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It expounds the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in South Africa
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- A South African preparatory committee was inaugurated in Mfumalanga Province on Apr. 6 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including lecture and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Kyrgyzstan, the Czech Republic and Nigeria on April 3 and 4 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party who is also chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan praised Kim Il Sung for founding the Juche idea, defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, developing the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious one and turning the DPRK into an invincible socialist state.
					
					 The secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party who doubles as acting chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association referred to the fact that Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il frustrated all sorts of imperialists' challenges and moves of aggression, providing a sure guarantee for victoriously advancing the cause of socialism, adding that the DPRK's revolutionary cause, pioneered by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il, is being creditably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a socialist power and dynamically encouraged the progressive people in their struggle for independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism recalled that Kim Il Sung met personages of different social standings from many countries during his lifetime and clarified the orientation and ways to lead the revolution and construction to victory.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at a seminar held in Nigeria.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Organizations of Russia
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Organizations of Russia
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia and Finland supported the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their all-out action with the U.S.
					 The Maritime Territorial Committee of the Russian Youth League in its statement on April 3 expressed full support for the Korean people's uncompromising struggle against the U.S. and its allies' moves of aggression.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. is setting in motion even nuclear strategic bombers in a bid to strike the DPRK and seeking to disarm it.
					
					 The U.S. worked out a plan for mounting a preemptive strike upon the DPRK in collusion with the south Korean regime. 
					
					 To cope with such undisguised moves of the U.S. and the south Korean regime, the DPRK is exerting great efforts into the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a statement on the same day said the situation on the Korean Peninsula inching close to the brink of a war due to the U.S. provocations clearly proves the validity of the Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people are getting united with the will to protect socialism, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK is firmly defending its sovereignty as it has strong military muscle.
					
					 We extend full support to the Korean people's just struggle.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would frustrate the imperialists' moves of aggression, build a more powerful country and reunify the country without fail under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Military Provocation Condemned by French Organizations
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Military Provocation Condemned by French Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Organizations of France and Nigeria denounced the U.S. and its allies' military provocation against the DPRK.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association in a statement on March 31 said the Western media are misleading the public opinion, claiming that the tension on the Korean Peninsula is ascribable to the DPRK's "military threat".
					
					 However, the U.S. and its allies are the chieftains disturbing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula as the U.S. is committing military provocation in denial of concluding a peace treaty, the statement noted.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to immediately stop the act of straining the situation on the peninsula and opt for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement on April 1 said if the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces ignite a war, the Korean people will never miss that chance to reunify the country and surely build a socialist thriving nation.
					
					 Being convinced that the service personnel and people of the DPRK would achieve a final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the statement expressed full support and solidarity for the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.

articles.title: Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Brazil, Mexico
articles.content:
Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Brazil, Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people were held in Brazil and Mexico on April 2 and 6.
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The national coordinator of the Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil accused the U.S. and its allies of pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the struggle of the party, army and people of the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country and supreme interests of the nation.
					
					 Pedro De Oliveira, assistant to the national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, the secretary in charge of social and political affairs of the Mexican Workers' Unique Centre and other speakers termed the U.S. and its allies' moves for nuclear war provocation an act of gravely harassing the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said that the DPRK will surely achieve a final victory as it has the might of single-minded unity and the strong military muscle under the wise Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un, and the U.S. and its allies are bound to meet ruin.
					
					 Statements were issued at the meetings.
					
					 The statements urged the U.S. to stop the reckless war maneuvers against the DPRK at once and replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 They called upon the world peace-loving people to positively turn out in the struggle against the high-handed and arbitrary practices of U.S. imperialism.

articles.title: DPRK Will Never Yield to Hostile Forces: Chilean Party Leader
articles.content:
DPRK Will Never Yield to Hostile Forces: Chilean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) denounced the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys' moves of aggression against the DPRK.
					 In a press interview on April 1 he mentioned that the future improvement of the acute situation on the Korean peninsula totally depends on the next behavior of the U.S. and the south Korean regime. He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has the right to have an access to all means including the nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. and its lackeys' move to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK wishes for peaceful reunification. However, if the U.S. ignites a war, it will not miss that opportunity and realize the national reunification.
					
					 Its stand is to protect peace and deter a war.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is a paragon of the world in showing how to protect the sovereignty of the country in the present era.
					
					 The DPRK will never yield to the hostile forces. It is ready for both a war and peace.
					
					 In another press interview on April 2, the first secretary accused the U.S. of threatening the independent countries and their people with nuclear weapons.
					
					 It is the legitimate right of the DPRK to develop its nuclear force to cope with the aggression by the U.S., he said, adding:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and its lackeys, south Korean puppets who are resorting to war maneuvers.
					
					 The DPRK is the only country fighting against U.S. imperialism.

Pak Ui Chun se reune con nuevo embajador gabones
